name: Gumdrop's Escape Final
description:
Gumdrop, the gingerbread man, wants to escape the cookie factory before the holiday season rush. Players will make decisions for Gumdrop as he explores the factory, searching for a way out. Along the way, players will need to be cautious of chefs, fellow gingerbread people, and animals as it is unclear who will help and who will hurt the escape plan. 

Once a player reaches the outdoors, they can click on the image to see an animated scene and hear a few happy jingle bells signaling a sweet victory!
